alert.note: Alert for George; Greene (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:40PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN MOBILE... WASHINGTON...SOUTH CENTRAL CLARKE...NORTHEASTERN GEORGE AND SOUTHEASTERN GREENE COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM CDT... At 240 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Saint Stephens to 3 miles northwest of Tibbie to 8 miles southwest of State Line. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Citronelle, Chatom, Leakesville, Chunchula, Saint Stephens, Wagarville, Gulfcrest, Deer Park, Tibbie, Calvert, Mount Vernon, McIntosh, and Movico. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi.
